item.title: Zhan-Zhuang and Meditation - The Detailed Tutorial
item.description: Posture and Key Points First of all, the principles of Zhan-Zhuang (standing meditation, sometimes called standing stumps practice) and meditation are actually the same. It’s just us labeling them as different things. In terms of appearance, one is practiced in a standing form and the other is practiced in a sitting form. Nowadays, many of us spend more time sitting and less time standing, so today I will probably talk
item.dc:creator: Dao of Healing

item.title: Be a vegetarian on Monday | Getting not enough protein as a vegetarian?
item.description: Subvert your ideas! Do you really know how to eat protein? Vegetarians are often being asked: Do you have enough protein? Do we absorb protein only by eating meat? ? Is it really the case? Let’s find out. *Kind reminder: this animation takes ~3 minutes, it is advised to watch with wifi connection. However, This perception is not correct. item.title: On Cancer & Tumor | The Painless Radiotherapy Method of Traditional Chinese Medicine
item.description: More and more people are getting cancer these years. Why? The reason is that once a tumor is identified, the treatment principles and methods are completely wrong. As a result, patients already going under a cancer treatment get new cancerous tumors while they are not fully recovered from the existing ones. The author of this article consulted many medical cases from ancient and modern times, and wrote this article based
item.dc:creator: Dao of Healing
